org.waarp.ftp.client
Class WaarpFtpClient

java.lang.Object
  org.waarp.ftp.client.WaarpFtpClient

public class WaarpFtpClient
extends Object

FTP Client using Apache Commons net FTP client (not working using FTPS or FTPSE)

Author:
"Frederic Bregier"

Field Summary
protected  org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPClient ftpClient
           
protected  String result
           
 
Constructor Summary
WaarpFtpClient(String server, int port, String user, String pwd, String acct, boolean isPassive, int ssl, int controlTimeout, int timeout)
          WARNING: SSL mode (FTPS and FTPSE) are not working due to a bug in Apache Commons-Net

                            String remote,
                            int getStoreOrAppend)
Ask to transfer a file

Parameters:
local - local filepath (limited to path if get, else full path)
remote - filename
getStoreOrAppend - -1 = get, 1 = store, 2 = append
Returns:
True if the file is correctly transfered
